Reviews.Title: GoPro a thing of the past, Welcome Mobius! a must for FPV
Reviews.Author: nate
Reviews.Content: this thing is amazing when used with a class 10 card, easy to use and stunning video.$320 less than a gopro and very, VERY close the same exact quality.I am that guy that is never happy and can complain about anything,  10hrs of use and nothing to gripe about.I am very satisfied with this purchase.  I would recommend this camera to anyone looking for a small 1080p action cam.

Reviews.Title: The Mobius is a true 'Digital' camera.
Reviews.Author: James P. Bivona "Jimmy Bivona, Photographer"
Reviews.Content: It is elegant. It is the quintessential 'digital' camera. It weighs less than 2 ounces and is the size of a matchbox. I carry it in a small leather pouch in my pocket - all the time. It does lovely stills ( very wide angle with slight barrel distortion ) and 2 wide videos. I don't know the exact angles but they are extreme. The quality of all the images is superlative. I carry a Sony DSC-HX200v, a Sony TX-1 and a Canon 6D in a Swiss Army backpack most of the time too. I'm very fond of these cameras for obvious reasons.The Mobius is a welcome member of this gang. I glued some velcro to the bottom of it's case and the bill of a tight fitting cap so that I can wear it. The camera records 4 gb, 31 minute videos and repeats the process until the battery runs out without any bother on my part. I plug it into a USB port on my computer and it downloads my imagery and then recharges the battery if I just leave it alone and don't mess with it. Definitely my kind of a pal and no burden on my funds.The camera came with the 'A' lens and if the 'B' lens is now available I'll change it out.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Product!
Reviews.Author: Dana Teel
Reviews.Content: This isn't the big thrills and frills kind of camera. What it is is small, light and very flexible. I use this camera to make videos when I'm flying my RC helicopters and these features were of paramount importance to me as most all of my helicopters are considered micro helis. I'm quite happy with the quality of the picture and programmable features of this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Edward Spidell
Reviews.Content: What a great little camera I use it on my quad copter and take aerial photography and video.  Crystal clear video.

Reviews.Title: For what I want this is an Excelent video camera
Reviews.Author: Louis M Atzel
Reviews.Content: I wanted a camera that I could put on my radio controlled glider. I wanted a camera that was light, small and could film video faster than 30 frames per second. This camera is HD and meets all of my needs. Plus it is reasonably priced. I am very happy with it.  I was thinking Go Pro but it is more than 3 times the cost and much larger and heavier.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value for the price
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer "svrider"
Reviews.Content: The biggest selling points are 1) small and light; 2) excellent video quality at 1080p; 3) easy access to settings; 4) multitude of settings that are easy to change. I put in a Samsung microSD 32GB card rated at 10 speed class and it works perfectly. While 1080p is excellent, the camera is after all a camera so in low light (on a bicycle) it struggles to capture license plates that are legible. In good daylight it's not an issue. The battery lasts about 80 minutes. 25 minutes of recording takes up about 2.7 GB. I don't know if the Mobius only works at USB 2.0, but that's what I have on my PC, which means it takes a while to offload a large file.I tried mounting it on bike handlebars using only rubber bands. It works, after a fashion but I believe there's more vibration compared to a standard mount. Even with a standard mount there is some vibration. The camera does not have any kind of stabilization.One drawback is that the Mobius is not in any way waterproof or water resistant. It's somewhat fragile, so it's probably not appropriate to use as a Black Box.While some people have complained about the heat sinks getting hot, that's not a problem on a bicycle. No issues there. I wish it came with the pull tie bar mount, but I've only seen that on the Mobius website for the Action Cam Pro package. I think this is the best camera for small size and image quality.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price, but some rolling shutter
Reviews.Author: Eric C.
Reviews.Content: If you don't want to shell out for a GoPro, then this is a great camera. I have it attached to my RCLogger Eye One Xtreme quadcopter and the video is nice, but has some rolling shutter. Other then that, you can't beat it for the price.

Reviews.Title: Unbelievable camera for the price!
Reviews.Author: KIBILL
Reviews.Content: I have several  video cameras  and by far  this is my favorite one..  Very simple to use the video is outstanding  for the price of this camera, if you do not have the money to purchase a go Pro or other high dollar camera and you want some excellent video  you cannot go wrong with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: Robert Hogsett
Reviews.Content: I got one of these to replace my keychain cam for recording my model airplane flights. I liked it so much, I ordered another! 1080p video, lighter than gopro, and MUCH cheaper! I had one on a plane that crashed into my 4runner, and not only did the camera survive (thrown over 100 feet away) it was still recording when I found it! Great cam for the price.

Reviews.Title: Outstanding with issues
Reviews.Author: Ron K.  Smythe "Ron K. Smythe"
Reviews.Content: You'll need to go online and search for Mobius camera instructions.  They seem overwhelmingly complex.  Actually, the camera is quite simple to use, once you get the hang of it.  Warning:  Use only Kingston brand micro sd cards, class 4, 8GB or 16GB.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Glenn B "Glenn B"
Reviews.Content: I fly Radio Control aircraft and was wanting a good camera to video flights using this for a hat cam. Had read a lot of reviews and all good and I was not disappointed either. Great picture, good sound and easy to program via software. This comes with many accessories available for car cams to bicycles. Many applications.

Reviews.Title: Awesome
Reviews.Content: The best I have had over all.Sound-video-size- easy step up. Ordering another to carry with me all the time. Never know what you will get.AWESOME..... , !!

Reviews.Title: Extremely Popular and Versatile Camera
Reviews.Author: GrantV
Reviews.Content: This is an extremely well known and well reviewed camera. Best not purchased by the tech challenged tho.Comes with no instructions, but go to U tube for many reviews and how-to's.Can easily find the well written manual on line, in addition to the very professional software for completely understanding and changing the options on this camera. Can be used for so many applications.Picture quality is amazing and can be set to accommodate so many shooting conditions. Can even change color rendition far beyond the understanding of most all who will purchase this.Literature says the battery life is 80 minutes. I left mine on continuously to verify this, and found that my new unit ran more than 90 minutes before shutting down.Doesn't come with a flash drive, but what instead is a MicroSD card to USB adapter.Also see the many memory options bundled with this purchase that you can buy along with the camera for a fair extra cost! Sky's the limit!Sound is far from CD quality, but this package is ever so cheap for all you get! Nothing else I have shopped for compares. And I did lots of research.

Reviews.Title: Ok but I want better
Reviews.Author: Nikita Biddle
Reviews.Content: It could of came faster and I need more memory than 8gb. Also, it came with no instructions and I don't know how to use the flash drive. It's hd but it has fuzzies and seems to shut down sometimes on its own and you have to charge it everyday.

ProductInfo.Features:
Mounts as removable storage on PC/Mac/Linux for easy video transfer.
3 video recording rates: 1080 @ 30 fps, 720 @ 60 fps, or 720 @ 30 fps.
Internal, rechargeable, lithium battery provides up to 80 minutes of recording per charge.
Supports a microSD card up to 32 GB in size (card not included). Class 4 recommended.
Fully configurable via free PC configuration tool, Android App, or by manually editing the configuration text file (PC/Mac/Linux).
Mounting sleeve utilizes standard 1/4"-20 tripod thread.
Standard lens approx. FoV: 86 degrees (1080p) / 46 degrees (720p).
Camera weighs 1.37 oz (39 g) without mounting sleeve / 1.74 oz (50 g) with mounting sleeve.
ProductInfo.Name: 1080p Mobius ActionCam HD Camera Standard Edition (16GB)
